Title: Authorizes early voting sites to be placed at at least one city in a county, or if there is no city in such county, the county seat
Summary: Authorizes early voting sites to be placed at at least one city in a county, or if there is no city in such county, the county seat.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to authorizing early voting sites to be placed at at least one city in a county, or if there is no city in such county, the county seat
